name: LAD Solutions
tagline: Converting Dreams Into Reality One Click at a Time
description:
LAD Solutions is a nationally recognized full-service Digitial Agency based out of Los Angeles that specializes in Search Engine Optimization, Pay-Per-Click Management and Web Design & Development. Our mission for our clients is to "Convert Their Dreams Into Reality One Click at a Time."
Other services offered are Social Media Management, Google Penalty Removal, Online Reputation Management and Small Business Consulting.
